title: Northern Ireland could choose to follow a different time zone from Great Britain, business minister says
text:
Northern Ireland could choose to follow a different time zone from Great Britain, a business minister has said.

Kelly Tolhurst, a Tory business minister, said that following the European Parliament’s vote earlier this year to abolish Daylight Saving Time (DST), Northern Ireland could choose to exist in a different timezone to the UK after Brexit.

While the UK said it remained vigorously opposed to scrapping the practice, where a clock is moved one hour forward in Spring and on hour back in autumn, Ms Tolhurst conceded that a future Northern Ireland executive would be free to choose its own time arrangements.

“It would be a decision for the Executive and we would have to consider that,” Ms Tolhurst...
description: Northern Ireland could choose to follow a different time zone from Great Britain, a business minister has said.
